record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - September 06, 2007)

[Page: H10196]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on September 6, 2007, I was unable to be present for all rollcall votes due to a family medical emergency.
If present, I would have voted accordingly on the following rollcall votes:
Roll No. 854--"nay"; Roll No. 855--"nay"; Roll No. 856--"aye"; Roll No. 857--"aye"; Roll No. 858--"aye"; Roll No. 859--"no".
